Name: Gladio
About the game: EXPERIENCE INTENSE COMBAT Fight against 5 different enemy types across 3 unique levels, each presenting unique gameplay opportunities. Your Health is a precious resource, as it is consumed by attacking your enemies but can be regained quickly if those attacks are successful. Tougher enemies will deal more damage, but will reward you with more health - if you defeat them. You must be both aggressive and efficient in order to survive. UTILIZE FREEDOM OF MOVEMENT You may be outnumbered, but you possess advanced movement capabilities which will give you an edge over your adversaries. Whether you need to create some extra breathing room or reach a pesky archer, you can traverse the environment as necessary.
